## TextureAtlasManager.atlasTextureRestoreHandler property

The texture restore handler callback function This callback function will be called whenever the device has been restored

**Signature:**

```typescript
get atlasTextureRestoreHandler(): (tex: BaseTexture) => Promise<void>;

set atlasTextureRestoreHandler(f: (tex: BaseTexture) => Promise<void>);
```
